Class EvaluateCMCS

java.lang.Object
EvaluateCMCS
public class EvaluateCMCS extends Object
Class which evaluates a CMCS configuration on a set of DIMACS-W benchmark instances.

  • Method Details

    • runConfig

      public static int[][] runConfig(List<Heuristic> heuristics, int[][][] instances, long terminateInSeconds, double[][] msucc, double[][] mfail) throws FileNotFoundException
      Runs the given CMCS configuration on a set of instances and returns the results.
      Parameters:
      heuristics - The list of heuristic components used in the CMCS configuration.
      instances - The set of instances to run the CMCS configuration on.
      terminateInSeconds - The termination time the CMCS configuration to run on each instance.
      msucc - The success transition matrix.
      mfail - The failure transition matrix.
      Returns:
      A 2D array containing the objective value and cardinality for each instance.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException

    • runEvaluation

      public static void runEvaluation(List<Heuristic> heuristics) throws FileNotFoundException, IOException
      Controls the evaluation and CMCS parameters then runs evaluation and writes results to a file. Results are written every run to ensure the data is saved if the evaluation is interrupted
      Parameters:
      heuristics - The list of heuristic components used in the CMCS configuration.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException
      IOException
